name: GemCaverns Demo V0.1 (Base Tech Demo)
description:
This is a very short Tech Demo for my upcoming full platformer game GemCaverns!

This project is still in development, and this is NOT the full Demo for the game, this is just the initial demo for some of the features. This is meant to give those who download it a sense of what to expect from this project, feature-wise.

I am taking donations of any amount in order to help fund the progress of this game, as well as future titles. The full game (once it is released) will be $5, any demos I make for it will always be free.

This demo starts from the beginning of the game (no title screen added just yet) and ends once you defeat the first mini-boss (Giant Scorpion).

I have big plans for this game, so stay tuned for great things!

Controls:
---Gamepad (Xbox 360 controller style)---
A = Jump
X = shoot (once the Red Blaster is obtained)
START = pause menu
D-Pad = move
LT = run

---Keyboard---

left / right arrow keys = move
C = shoot (once the Red Blaster is obtained)
SPACE = jump
D = run
ESCAPE  = pause menu
